tests.data: {"url": "https://jcpretorius.com/blog/", "root_url": "https://jcpretorius.com/", "robots": {"url": "https://jcpretorius.com/robots.txt", "content": "Sitemap: https://jcpretorius.com/sitemap-index.xml\r\nUser-agent: * \r\nDisallow: /error/notfound", "status": "ok"}, "sitemap": {"nof_sitemaps": 1, "sitemap_urls_in_robots": ["https://jcpretorius.com/sitemap-index.xml"], "sitemaps": {"https://jcpretorius.com/sitemap-0.xml": {"use_https_only": true, "use_same_domain": true, "known_types": {"webpage": 67}, "has_duplicates_items": false, "is_duplicate": false, "nof_items": 67, "nof_items_no_duplicates": 67}}, "use_https_only": true, "use_same_domain": true, "known_types": {"webpage": 67}, "has_duplicates_items": false, "is_duplicate": false, "nof_items": 67, "nof_items_no_duplicates": 67, "sitemapindexes": ["https://jcpretorius.com/sitemap-index.xml"], "status": "sitemap(s) seem ok"}, "feeds": {"nof_feeds": 1, "feeds": ["/rss"], "status": "found in meta"}, "security": {"txts": {"https://jcpretorius.com/.well-known/security.txt": {"status": "ok"}, "https://jcpretorius.com/security.txt": {"status": "wrong content"}}, "status": "ok"}}
